scripts.deploy:development: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && export NETWORK='development' && truffle migrate
scripts.deploy:aurora: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && export NETWORK='aurora' && truffle migrate --network aurora
scripts.deploy:auroraTestnet: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && export NETWORK='auroraTestnet' && truffle migrate --network auroraTestnet
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && export NETWORK='goerli' && truffle migrate --network goerli
